title: What happened to the star guardian login?
body: It was one of the best login screens, and lasted like 2 or 3 days before it was gone and back to Ivern again...

replies.body: Just how it is. Now we have the Worlds login back.
This is what riot needs to fix like idk, ASCENSION AND URF {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
ikrrr i loved it and now its just some crappy ivern music like bring back the badass star guardian one
